Paragraph: Moreover , the observed hole mobility is higher than those of the recent reported mainchain D-A polymers , 9 verifying that side - chain D-A polymers can have strong intermolecular orbital overlap and good molecular packing like main - chain D-A polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| mainchain D-A polymers |
| side-chain D-A polymers |
| main-chain D-A polymers |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. mainchain D-A polymers
2. side-chain D-A polymers
3. main-chain D-A polymers

These entities represent different types of polymers with donor-acceptor (D-A) structures.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| side-chain D-A polymers |

After reevaluating the paragraph, I found that only one clear "Material Name" entity exists:

1. side-chain D-A polymers

The other entities, mainchain D-A polymers and main-chain D-A polymers, are repeated with different hyphenation, and I have consolidated them into a single entity. However, none of these entities are clear in the context, as they are not explicitly defined in the paragraph.

Paragraph: Moreover , the observed hole mobility is higher than those of the recent reported mainchain D-A polymers , 9 verifying that side - chain D-A polymers can have strong intermolecular orbital overlap and good molecular packing like main - chain D-A polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| higher |

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "higher," "those of the recent reported mainchain D-A polymers," "strong intermolecular orbital overlap," and "good molecular packing." These entities are mentioned as characteristics of side-chain D-A polymers, in comparison to recent reported mainchain D-A polymers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |

| strong intermolecular orbital overlap |

After removing entities that do not clearly refer to the value of a material property, the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "higher," "strong intermolecular orbital overlap," and "good molecular packing." These entities are mentioned as characteristics of side-chain D-A polymers, in comparison to recent reported mainchain D-A polymers. The entity "those of the recent reported mainchain D-A polymers" was removed because it is a comparison to other materials, rather than a specific value of a material property.
